info.description: The Analyst Coverage API enables users to assign, transfer, or remove analyst coverage assignments for one or more entities. It also support discovery of coverage for an analyst or entity today or in the past.
info.title: Investment Analyst Coverage

post.description: Assigns analyst coverage to an entity
post.summary: Assigns analyst coverage to an entity

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

parameters.description: Coverage entry to create
parameters.name: body

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

id.description: Resources must have a 'id' field. Id describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.

entityId.title: The id of the research entity e.g cusip, issuer id, Investment Strategy id, sector code, fund id

analystId.title: The user id of the analyst

analystRole.title:
Role of research analyst, the valid values for this is the list of decodes for ANALYST_TYPE
e.g. Primary Credit Analyst, Primary Equity Analyst, Secondary Equity Analyst

creator.title: The user id who created this entity

startTime.title: Time when this entry was created

modifier.title: The user id who modified this entry

endTime.title: Time when this entry was removed/expired

requests.description: The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.

analystCoverages.description: The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.
The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.
The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.

analystCoverages.title:
The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.
Transfer Coverage entry to new user

analystCoverages.description: The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.

v1CoverageActionType.description:
- COVERAGE_ACTION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED
 - COVERAGE_ACTION_TYPE_ADD: Add a new coverage
 - COVERAGE_ACTION_TYPE_TRANSFER: Transfer a coverage
 - COVERAGE_ACTION_TYPE_REMOVE: Remove a coverage
v1CoverageActionType.title: Coverage action types

v1SearchActiveAnalystCoverageRequest.title:
Search Active coverage requests
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

filterCriteria.title:
Criteria used to search AnalystCoverages. Supports Solr query format (for now): [target field]:[term] Eg: analystId:"rbajarol"
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We really need this field because it is already implemented in prod --)

orderBy.title: Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc. e.g. "modified_time desc, analystId"

pageSize.description: The maximum number of coverages to return. The service may return fewer than this value. Default 10 note will be returned.

v1SearchCoverageResponse.title:
The response message for AnalystCoverageAPI.SearchAnalystCoverage.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::response-next-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

analystCoverages.description: The entities that match the specified AnalystCoveragesRequest.

v1SearchHistoricalAnalystCoverageRequest.title:
Search Historical coverage requests
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

filterCriteria.title:
Criteria used to search all AnalystCoverages including historical. Supports Solr query format (for now):Eg: analystId:"rbajarol"
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
aip.dev/not-precedent: We really need this field because it is already implemented in prod --)

orderBy.title: Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc. e.g. "modified_time desc, analystId"

pageSize.description: The maximum number of coverages to return. The service may return fewer than this value. Default 10 note will be returned.

analystCoverage.title: Transfer Coverage entry to new user

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
